name: feedback
description: Users(developers) can give feedback tousers(developers). User can see feedback given to them but they will not be able to see thename of the developer who has given feedback to them, that means the sender name isanonymous. In this, the first party can give feedback to the second party and the secondparty can also give feedback to the first party but they will not know the name of thesender. The Purpose of this is particularly helpful because it allows employees to speaktheir minds as freely as possible.
